description: Découvrez les meilleurs hôtels à Plaine Magnien, Mauritius. Trouvez des offres exclusives et des hébergements de luxe.

hotels.title: Mauritius Five-Star Island Paradise with Exclusive Restaurant
hotels.description: The line between a wellness retreat and an adventure playground blurs at Anantara Iko Mauritius Resort & Villas, a stunning oceanfront oasis on the postcard-perfect coastline of Le Chaland Beach. When it comes to dining, you're spoilt for choice. Dine on seafood grilled to perfection at the exclusive Sea.Fire.Salt, or indulge in plant-based delicacies, Mauritian rum cocktails or stone-baked pizza as you please. Meanwhile, enjoy a tipple at the onsite wine cellar restaurant, 1884.
